trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 古老的深海乌鸦在对抗法术和其他魔法效果时有优势。

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: 在昏暗的光线或黑暗中，古深乌鸦可以把隐藏动作作为一个额外动作。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 古老的深海乌鸦进行三次攻击：一次用下颚，两次用爪子。

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}17({@damage 2d10 + 6})的穿刺伤害，并且目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 19})。直到这个抓取动作结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，古深乌鸦不能对其他目标使用它的下颚。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})砍击伤害。

action.name: Shadow Caw
entries: The ancient deep crow releases an ear-splitting caw. Each creature within 60 feet of the crow and able to hear it must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The deep crow makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Shadow Caw (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 古老的深山乌鸦使用影子叫声。

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 古老的深海乌鸦拍打它的翅膀。每个在深海乌鸦10英尺范围内的生物都必须在一个{@dc 19}灵巧的蓄力动作上成功，否则会受到13({@damage 2d6 + 6})的重击伤害并被击倒{@condition prone}。古老的深海乌鸦随后可以飞到其飞行速度的一半。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: 奥斯皮西亚的先天法术能力是智力。她可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何组件。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥斯皮奇亚进行了两次攻击。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则为8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}击中，范围80/320英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brahma is a 4th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Brahma has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Taunt (2/Day)
entries: 梵天可以使用一个额外的行动，在她30英尺范围内瞄准一个她能看到的生物。如果目标能听到梵天的声音，它必须在一个{@dc 13} "魅力 "救赎中成功，或者在能力检查、攻击卷和救赎中处于劣势，直到梵天的下一个回合开始。

action.name: War Lute
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Song of Domination (3/Day)
entries: 梵天以一个能看到或听到她的生物为目标，该生物必须在智慧救赎中成功，否则将在1分钟内被她控制。目标可以在它的每个回合结束时重复拯救，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。如果目标公开或秘密地想要被梵天吸引，那么它在这些救赎中处于劣势。在魅惑效果结束后的1小时内，目标在与梵天的较量中，在智力、智慧或魅力方面的检查中处于劣势。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 混乱的四足动物对法术和其他魔法效果有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 混乱的四足动物最多可以进行两次触手攻击。

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})重击伤害。如果目标是生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃生{@dc 14})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}。混乱四足动物每次可以抓取不超过两个目标。

action.name: Chaos Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 混乱的四足动物射出一束旋转的空灵之光，在它周围60英尺内可以看到的地方爆炸。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}智力测验，否则就会被{@condition stunned}，直到下一回合结束。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 虽然发条龙保持不动，但它与金属雕像没有区别。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 这条发条龙在15英尺的范围内喷出火焰。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 11}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到14({@damage 4d6})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 深海乌鸦在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击上有优势。

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: 在昏暗的光线或黑暗中，深海乌鸦可以把隐藏动作作为一个额外动作。

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the deep crow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 深海乌鸦进行三次攻击：一次用下颌骨，两次用爪子。

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})穿刺伤害，目标为{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 17})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，深海乌鸦不能对其他目标使用它的下颚。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})砍击伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Donaar is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Champion Challenge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Donaar causes each creature of his choice that he can see within 30 feet of him to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature can't willingly move more than 30 feet away from Donaar. This effect ends on the creature if Donaar is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, or if the creature is moved more than 30 feet away from him.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 多纳尔用他的大剑或鞭子进行两次攻击。

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})砍击伤害。每当多纳尔在伤害骰子上掷出1或2时，他可以重新掷骰子，并且必须使用新的骰子。

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Acid Vomit
entries: 多纳尔在5英尺宽的30英尺范围内回吐酸液。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 12}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到7({@damage 2d6})酸的伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Flabbergast is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 4}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jim is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Jim carries a {@item wand of wonder}.

trait.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after Jim Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，吉姆最多可以传送30英尺到他能看到的空间。这个空间必须是无人的，或者被一个愿意的小型或中型生物占据。如果是后者，吉姆和愿意的生物同时传送，互换位置。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Minor Conjuration
entries: 吉姆变出一个无生命的物体，边长不超过3英尺，重量不超过10磅，在他手中或在他能看到的10英尺内无人的地方。该物体具有明显的魔力，在5英尺范围内放射出昏暗的光。如果它受到任何伤害，1小时后，或者当吉姆再次使用这个功能时，它就会消失。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: K'thriss's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: K'thriss is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). He regains his expended spell slots when he finishes a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: K'thriss wears a {@item robe of stars} (accounted for in his statistics). The robe allows him to cast the following spells: 6/day: {@spell magic missile} (7 missiles)

trait.name: Awakened Mind
entries: K'thris可以用心灵感应与他周围30英尺内的任何生物说话，只要该生物能理解至少一种语言。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: K'thriss has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep. Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, K'thriss has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: K'thris用他的镰刀进行了两次攻击。

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Customizable Storage
entries: 一个小桶机器人可以在其中空的桶形身体内容纳多达三种类型的液体有效载荷，共计12加仑。一个装满的小桶机器人在必须重新装满液体之前，每加仑可以进行一次液体攻击。填充一个小桶机器人需要每加仑2个回合。不同的有效载荷可以改变酒桶机器人的攻击，而不是这里所介绍的那些。

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Acid Squirt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围20/40英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})酸性伤害。

action.name: Beer Shower
entries: 啤酒桶机器人在15英尺的锥形范围内或在5英尺宽的30英尺范围内喷出不自然的烈性啤酒。该区域内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 13}体质测试，否则会被{@condition poisoned}。在这样的情况下，生物的速度会因为接触到强烈的酒液而减半。受影响的生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。
此外，啤酒花洒还能熄灭其区域内的任何火种或明火。

action.name: Hot Oil Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The keg robot sprays hot oil in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) fire damage and falls {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}.
Any creature affected by the hot oil spray that takes fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute) takes an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage, and the oil burns away.
如果留在喷洒区域的油被点燃，它将燃烧{@dice 1d4}个回合，并对任何在一个回合中首次进入该区域或在那里结束其回合的生物造成3({@damage 1d6})的火焰伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 莫尔金的法术能力是智力。她可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料成分。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Môrgæn is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following ranger spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Môrgæn has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 莫尔金用她的弯刀或长弓进行三次攻击。

action.name: Scimitars
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Oak has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥克用他的钩状匕首或他的手弩进行三次攻击。

action.name: Hooked Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Return the Favor (3/Day)
entries: 当奥克受到近战武器攻击的伤害时，他可以进行一次钩状匕首攻击。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Omin is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Strike
entries: 在他的每个回合中，当他用武器攻击击中一个生物时，Omin可以使攻击造成额外的4({@dice 1d8})同类型武器的伤害。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Omin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥明用他的大锤做了两次攻击。

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})重击伤害。

reaction.name: War God's Blessing (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 当Omin身边30英尺内的生物进行攻击卷，但在得知是命中还是未中之前，Omin可以给予该生物一个+10的奖励。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Pendragon is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Echo Spell (1/Day)
entries: 潘德拉贡可以施放他在最后一回合施放的法术，其施放时间变成1个奖励行动。这种额外的施法会像正常一样使用一个法术槽。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Phoenix is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Display (1/Day)
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，菲尼克斯使他的盾牌发出神圣的光芒。在他周围30英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}的智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被{@condition blinded}，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复救赎，如果成功则结束对它的影响。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 菲尼克斯进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})重击伤害，目标必须在{@dc 12}力量救赎中成功，或者被推到5英尺。

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: 当Portentia用武器攻击击中目标并在攻击卷上有优势时，或者当目标在Portentia的盟友5英尺范围内不是{@condition incapacitated}且Portentia在攻击卷上没有劣势时，会造成额外的14({@dice 4d6})伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Portentia进行三次近战攻击。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Change Shape
entries: 波坦提亚会神奇地幻化成一个挑战等级等于或小于她自己的人形或野兽，或者变回她的真实形态。她所穿戴或携带的任何装备都会被新形态吸收或承担（由她选择）。在新形态中，波坦提亚保留了她的游戏数据和说话的能力，但她的攻击力、移动模式、力量、灵巧和特殊感官被新形态所取代，并且她获得了新形态所拥有但她所缺乏的任何数据和能力（除了等级特征、传奇行动和巢穴行动）。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Prophetess is a 5th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Prophetess has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Prophetess can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Prophetess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Prophetess has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})重击伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rosie's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Brave
entries: Rosie has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: 罗西可以在任何体积比她大的生物的空间里移动。

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果罗西受到的效果允许她做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，如果她的蓄力动作成功，她就不会受到伤害，如果失败，她就只会受到一半的伤害。如果她是{@condition incapacitated}，她就不能使用这个特性。

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: 当罗西处于昏暗的光线或黑暗中时，她可以使用一个额外的动作，将她传送到一个她能看到的、也处于昏暗光线或黑暗中的无人空间。然后她在该回合结束前进行的第一次近战攻击中具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 罗西进行三次攻击，然后进行两次徒手攻击。

action.name: Staff of the Master (+1 Quarterstaff)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})重击伤害，如果双手使用，则为8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害。罗西的徒手打击是神奇的。

reaction.name: Deflect Missiles
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Rosie deflects the missile. The damage she takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, she catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and she has a hand free.

trait.name: Defensive Advantage
entries: 只要Splugoth的两个或两个以上的盟友在他的5英尺范围内，并且不是{@condition incapacitated}，对他的攻击卷就会以劣势进行。

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Splugoth可以在他的每个回合中采取脱离或隐藏行动作为额外行动。

trait.name: Touch of Madness
entries: Splugoth在对{@condition charmed}或{@condition frightened}的蓄力攻击上有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Splugoth用他的匕首做了两次攻击。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Word From Beyond (1/Day)
entries: 在从下一个世界走回这个世界时，Splugoth记得并大声重复他进入的一个地方的几个词。在他周围30英尺内的每个生物，如果能听到他的声音，就必须在一个{@dc 12}的智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被{@condition stunned}，直到下一个回合结束。

reaction.name: Absorb Attack
entries: When a creature Splugoth can see hits him with a melee weapon attack, the weapon snags on a pocket of residual resurrectional energy and is caught fast. The attack is negated and the weapon cannot be used until the creature succeeds on a {@dc 12} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check as an action to pull it out of Splugoth. Natural weapons can have their attacks negated by this feature, but can then be retracted automatically at the end of the attacking creature's turn.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果Viari受到的效果允许他做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，如果他的蓄力动作成功，他就不会受到伤害，如果他失败了，就只会受到一半的伤害。如果他是{@condition incapacitated}，他就不能使用这个特性。

trait.name: Second-Story Work
entries: 攀爬不会让Viari付出额外的行动。此外，当他进行跑步跳跃时，他所覆盖的距离会增加5英尺。

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: 当Viari用武器攻击击中目标并在攻击卷上有优势时，或者当目标在Viari的盟友5英尺范围内不是{@condition incapacitated}且Viari在攻击卷上没有劣势时，会造成额外的14（{@dice 4d6}）伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Viari用他的短剑进行两次攻击，用他的长剑进行两次攻击。

action.name: +1 Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Viari在被攻击时受到的伤害会减半。他必须能够看到攻击者。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Walnut is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Walnut has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: 即使她只是被树叶、大雨、落雪、薄雾和其他自然现象轻度遮挡，胡桃也能尝试隐藏。

trait.name: Wild Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Walnut can assume the shape of a dire wolf. She can stay in this form for 3 hours or until she reverts to her normal form as a bonus action. She automatically reverts if she falls {@condition unconscious}, drops to 0 hit points, or dies.
在变身时，胡桃的游戏数据被地狼的数据所取代，除了她保留了她的排列组合、个性、智力、智慧和魅力分数。
Her attacks in beast form are magical. While in beast form, Walnut can use a bonus action to expend one spell slot and regain {@dice 1d8} hit points per level of the spell slot expended.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 胡桃用前母或她的长弓进行两次攻击。

action.name: Foremother (+1 Scimitar)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。
